nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi - The Official Guide

Star Wars: The Last Jedi - The Official Guide is a commemorative magazine that covers various elements from Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and was published in Australia by Hardie Grant Egmont in 2017.

Despite the destruction of Starkiller Base, the Resistance is still no match for the might of the First Order, led by Supreme Leader Snoke and his apprentice Kylo Ren. While Finn, BB-8 and Poe Dameron put up a desperate fight, Rey meets Luke Skywalker on a remote planet and asks him to join the battle to help save the galaxy. But the Jedi Master might not be the answer the Resistance needs...

The Star Wars: The Last Jedi Official Guide includes backstories of the heroes and villains, profiles of the Resistance and First Order fleets, and a look behind the scenes with stunning on-set photos and concept art - all you need to know to enjoy the latest chapter of the Star Wars saga.
